scripts.dev: cd backend; pnpm run dev & cd ../frontend; pnpm run dev
scripts.build: cd backend; pnpm run build & cd ../frontend; pnpm run build
scripts.start: cd backend; pnpm start & cd ../frontend; pnpm start
scripts.test: cd backend; pnpm run test; cd ../frontend; pnpm run test
scripts.lint: cd backend; pnpm run lint & cd ../frontend; pnpm run lint
scripts.install:all: cd backend; pnpm install & cd ../frontend; pnpm install
scripts.download-updates:backend: cd backend; pnpm run lint; cd ../backend; pnpm run lint
scripts.download-updates:frontend: cd backend; git pull & cd ../frontend; git pull
scripts.download-updates:all: cd backend; pnpm run test & cd ../frontend; pnpm run test
scripts.clone:backend: BACKEND_REPO=$(grep BACKEND_REPO .env | cut -d '=' -f2); git clone $BACKEND_REPO backend
scripts.clone:frontend: FRONTEND_REPO=$(grep FRONTEND_REPO .env | cut -d '=' -f2); git clone $FRONTEND_REPO frontend
scripts.clone:all: pnpm run clone-backend & pnpm run clone-frontend
